definition: to punish (someone)/to take disciplinary action against (someone)
to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

sentences.english: His conduct calls for the severest condemnation.
sentences.chinese: 他的行爲有必要受到最嚴厲的懲辦。

sentences.english: He was punished for taking bribes.
